column1: #text=I did my research and made sure that whatever tree I was planting could survive in my region , since my state can get cold .
#text=I checked to make sure it was okay to plant the tree .
#text=Since my parents were the land-owners , they said yes .
#text=I made sure to plant it far away from the house and any piper or wires .
#text=That way , when it grew larger , it would not be dangerous .
#text=I decided to plant a pine tree .
#text=They are not as messy in the fall , because they have needles that they keep instead of leaves that they shed .
#text=I bought a small sapling at a store .
#text=Growing a tree from a seed is more difficult .
#text=I dug a hole in the ground wide enough to hold the roots well and about 4 inches deep .
#text=I gently removed the tree from its container and placed it into the hole .
#text=Then , I covered the hole back up with soil and watered the tree .
